actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to revise the pay structure for nonsupervisory positions of deputy U.S. marshal, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Authorizes the Attorney General to revise the pay structure from the present GS-6 through GS-9 levels to GS-7 through GS-11 rates for nonsupervisory positions of deputy United States marshal. (Adds 5 U.S.C. 5366, 5102(c)(28))

titles.title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to revise the pay structure for nonsupervisory positions of deputy U.S. marshal, and for other purposes.
